### 1. T·∫°o d·ª± √°n m·ªõi tr√™n Blynk Console
* Truy c·∫≠p [Blynk Console](https://blynk.cloud/) v√† t·∫°o m·ªôt t√†i kho·∫£n (n·∫øu ch∆∞a c√≥).

### 2. C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t th√¥ng tin v√†o m√£ ngu·ªìn
